member.name: M:AsymmetricDecryption.Asymmetric.Decrypt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts with asymmetric key (for Raw data)
member.returns: Decrypted data, or if the data cannot be decrypted.

member.name: M:AsymmetricDecryption.Asymmetric.CopyStreamToStream(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Method to copy data in one stream to another

member.name: M:AsymmetricDecryption.Asymmetric.DecryptData(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts data. At first reads encrypted Rijndael key. Decrypts it using private RSA key. And decrypts data using decrypted Rijndael key.

member.name: T:AsymmetricEncryption.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AsymmetricEncryption.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AsymmetricEncryption.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
